1: ided awareness, the company needs more efforts to reach a better commercial effectiveness. top of mind it is the first brand, named by the interviewee, related to a certain product family. it is the closest indicator to the intention to buy or to the current use of the products and it is strictly linked to the brand value. prominence index it is the relationship between top of mind and unaided awareness; it is an indicator of knowledge quality and it estimates the brand capability to represent the product family to those who know it, regardless its overall awareness. relevance index it is the relationship between unaided awareness and the aided one. it defines the brand capability to be recalled whenever the customer decides to make a purchase. 14 14dental products in general: unaided awareness what company brands come to your mind, when speaking about dental products in general? regarding the mentioned brands, it is interesting to note that dentsply sirona has gained as much awareness as 3m. ivoclar remains one of the most frequently mentioned brands, followed by kerr and gc. among the top mentioned brands, we can still find henry schein among the dealers, and it is noteworthy that straumann is mentioned among the top 10 brands overall, while in 2018 no implants

practice setups and points towards high reliance in countries like germany and france, with varying but notable proportions in other countries.13 brand awareness: dental products in general awareness analysisbrand awareness analysis glossary unaided awareness it represents the entire group of brands of a certain product family, recalled by the interviewed sample. within the boundaries of spontaneous awareness, the consumer reasonably decides to make a purchase. aided awareness and total awareness the aided awareness represents the awareness level of the brands named by the interviewer. the total awareness is made up of the unaided awareness and by the aided one. the aided awareness shows how many respondents identify the brand once it is quoted, it is an important index in the buying process but, if it is not sustained by a high level of unaided awareness, the company needs more efforts to reach a better commercial effectiveness. top of mind it is the first brand, named by the interviewee, related to a certain product family. it is the closest indicator to the intention to buy or to the current use of the products and it is strictly linked to the brand value. prominence index it is the relationship between top of mind and unaided awareness; it is an indicator of knowledge quality and it estimates the brand capability to represent the product family to

ided awareness, the company needs more efforts to reach a better commercial effectiveness. top of mind it is the first brand, named by the interviewee, related to a certain product family. it is the closest indicator to the intention to buy or to the current use of the products and it is strictly linked to the brand value. prominence index it is the relationship between top of mind and unaided awareness; it is an indicator of knowledge quality and it estimates the brand capability to represent the product family to those who know it, regardless its overall awareness. relevance index it is the relationship between unaided awareness and the aided one. it defines the brand capability to be recalled whenever the customer decides to make a purchase. 14 14dental products in general: unaided awareness what company brands come to your mind, when speaking about dental products in general? regarding the mentioned brands, it is interesting to note that dentsply sirona has gained as much awareness as 3m. ivoclar remains one of the most frequently mentioned brands, followed by kerr and gc. among the top mentioned brands, we can still find henry schein among the dealers, and it is noteworthy that straumann is mentioned among the top 10 brands overall, while in 2018 no implants

response.1: 3M was the top brand in terms of top of mind awareness in Italy in 2019.
response.2: The mean NPS for Amann Girrbach in Spain in 2019 is 11.5.
response.3: In 2015, 40% of clinics in Europe relied on traditional methods for digital restorations.
response.4: The brand with the highest total awareness in Brazil in 2022 is Dentsply Sirona.
response.5: The most popular scanner brand in European dental labs in 2015 was 3shape, with a market share of 28%.
response.6: In 2015, 87% of dental professionals in Germany used partner labs for intraoral scanner files.
response.7: The main suppliers for consumable products in dental clinics in Europe in 2023 are Henry Schein, Megadental, GACD, and Proclinic.
response.8: The brand with the highest unaided awareness in Brazil in 2022 according to the prominence index is not explicitly mentioned in the provided information.
response.9: The most relevant reasons for using milling units in Europe in 2015 include efficiency, simplification of procedures, and overall increased quality over traditional prosthetics procedures. These factors were important for both dental practices and laboratories.
response.10: In 2018, 22% of clinics in Spain found "price convenience" important.
response.11: In Europe in 2015, Spain's clinic market is more focused on the nearness concept.
response.12: Formlabs was the leading 3D printing brand in dental offices in Spain in 2019.
response.13: In Spain in 2019, brands perceived as very reliable had 41% of respondents considering them "totally relevant" in terms of reliability. The perception of reliability was a key attribute among various brands, with a notable portion of the population viewing it as significant.
response.14: The strengths of brand image for dental clinics in Europe in 2023 include strong brand recognition and reputation for reliability, as seen in brands like Dentsply Sirona and 3M. These brands are prominent in the market, with Dentsply Sirona leading in unaided awareness in countries like the UK, Spain, and Italy. Additionally, certain brands are associated with innovation and a good price/quality ratio, which enhances their brand image.
